intro.description: This cheatsheet guides you through the steps required for deleting a comment.

item.title: Select comment
item.description: Go to "Comments Summary" view and select a comment via clicking on it. Alternatively select a comment by moving the cursor in the currently open editor to the comments annotation and select it via shortkey "CTRL+Shift+#".

item.title: Delete Comment
item.description: Press the "Delete comment(s)" button in the "Comments Summary" view. Alternatively go the highlighted range of a comment in the editor and use the shortkey "CTRL+Shift+-".
